author: Ben Schoon
title: YouTube tests bringing back direct messages, a ‘top feature request’ - 9to5Google
description: YouTube’s latest test is preparing support for direct messages where users can share videos with each other and have conversations....
content:
YouTube’s latest test is preparing support for direct messages where users can share videos with each other and have conversations.
Detailed on a support page, YouTube is now testing “new ways to sh… [+2022 chars]
